title: (x) Happy Father's Day script - Sloop Script {Yves}
content:
Hello there,

Father's Day is coming soon. I found this cool font "Father's" in one of the online ads. Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [father's day.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018144637/http:/typophile.com/files/father's%20day.jpg) | 18.73 KB |
author: tddots

comments.content: This lush script is [Sloop Script One](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018144637/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=3&displayfontid=FB.8035.0.0&fontRendererText=Father%27s) by [Richard Lipton](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018144637/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Richard%20Lipton).
Thank you very much! That's fast. Yeah it is.
